body: A blogger at The Roving Ronin Report posted videos and pictures [en] of the Firewalking Festival (Akibasan Gongen Hibuse Matsuri) in Odawara, where "Buddhist Priests dressed as Yamabushi - mountain hermits - walked over hot coals."
original_body: A blogger at The Roving Ronin Report posted videos and pictures [en] of the Firewalking Festival (Akibasan Gongen Hibuse Matsuri) in Odawara, where "Buddhist Priests dressed as Yamabushi - mountain hermits - walked over hot coals."
title: Japan: Firewalking Festival
